attributes.action: Violent disorder offenders should be sent into the armed forces instead of prison.
attributes.additional_details:
There is a lack of discipline among some young people and parents are either unwilling or unable to provide it.
Judges should be given the power to order offenders into the armed forces so that they can  learn to become responsible citizens. Since taxpayers pay for them to serve there sentances  they can give back to the community instead of taking from it.
